Original: The Seattle kids petitioned Washington state last year to adopt stricter science-based regulations to protect them against climate change.
Simplification: The Seattle kids asked the Washington state last year to take tougher rules against climate change.

Original: Complex Sea slugs dubbed sacoglossans are some of the most remarkable biological burglars on the planet.
Simplification: Scientists say these are some of the most interesting creatures on the planet.

Original: The obtained results are summarized in section 5.
Simplification: The results of the investigation are summarized in section 5.

Original: “It’s more of a family than living outside,” said Jessica Konczal, 33, whose husband is Sgt. Matthew Konczal.
Simplification: “It’s more of a family than living outside,” said Jessica Konczal, 33, whose husband is Sgt. Matthew Konczal.

Original: Parental feedback on the menu additions so far, from some of the early adopter markets, has been “phenomenal,” Leverton said.
Simplification: So far, parents parents have feedback on the menu changes has been a great deal, he added.

Original: One of the device’s inventors explained to the president that the machine was a prototype.
Simplification: One of the inventors told the president that the first design was a design.

Original: Some of Russian space agency's launching missions used hydranize as fuel for the initial few stages.
Simplification: Hydranize is used to power the early stages of some Russian launchers.

Original: They float in and out of formations that combine the underwater world with the stage.
Simplification: They float in and out of places that combine stage with the underwater.

Original: Aliteracy (sometimes spelled alliteracy) is the state of being able to read but being uninterested in doing so.
Simplification: Aliteracy is when one is able to read but is not interested in reading.
